comment: Professor Ham comes off confusing at first with his accent but, eventually you get used to it. He didn't really like me as a student but, that didn't matter. I did well in his class because he teaches the material like a true Ph.D professor. Work hard for your grade. I recommend this man.

Dr. Ham is an amazing professor. He keeps his class fun, entertaining and very easy. He's a very dedicated professor and his tests are designed to really examine your understanding of the course. Overall, GREAT professor.

Dr. Ham is the man! Awesome professor! He's a true genius. His tests are very fair, his grading is very fair and lenient as well. He also has a very good sense of humor. I really enjoyed taking his class and I wish I could take more classes with him.

He is a dedicated teacher. He is enthusiastic and well prepared for class. He makes every subject easily understandable. You just need to pay attention to his lecture. I didnâ€™t know that the modeling of dynamic systems is so easy till I took his class. Exams are also very fair.

You will learn very little from this professor. His language comprehension and communication skills make asking questions difficult. Teaching methods are poor and confusing. Very little real world examples/studies. Study outside of class and stay on his "good side" to get an easy grade. Course load is usually not bad. No help with labs. Good luck!
